div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 18px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 94px; white-space: nowrap;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: 'Courier New'; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 65px; white-space: nowrap; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 66px; max-width: 106px; width: 106px; white-space: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; overflow: hidden; max-height: 66px; max-width: 106px; width: 106px; white-space: normal; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;
